review: The Fire TV stick works well for what it is, but it's lacking in the apps department compared to Roku or Chromecast. It's tough to beat price-wise though.
author: Amazon Customer "tinmanx"

review: Very easy to use. Met my expectations. Recommended.
author: mark Lambert

review: This has been an excellent addition for our entertainment.  Easy to install and use.
author: Lisa DiMaggio

review: So far the technology has worked very well.  The video quality seems lower than BluRay or cable but generally is just fine.
author: Charles Lawson "Chuck Lawson"

review: Easy to use and much better viewing than old system with blue ray dvd.
author: AJ
